Name: Reducing city government emission of greenhouse gases by 40 percent by 2030.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing city government emission of greenhouse gases by 40 percent by 2020
Summary: The proposed legislation requires a 40 percent reduction in city government emissions by calendar year 2020, relative to such emissions for the base year for city government emissions.
Text:
Int. No. 267

By Council Member Brannan and the Public Advocate (Mr. Williams) (by request of the Queens Borough President)

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing city government emission of greenhouse gases by 40 percent by 2020
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Paragraph (1) of subdivision b of section 24-803 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 22 for the year 2008, is amended to read as follows:
                     (1) There shall be, at minimum, a [thirty]30 percent reduction in city government emissions by calendar year 2017, and a 40 percent reduction in city government emissions by calendar year 2030, relative to such emissions for the base year for city government emissions.
                     ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.


SS (2015)/SS, MMB (2018)
LS #4576/Int. 0962-2015
NEW LS # 193
1/9/18; 1:41 p.m.
